entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180002}I ain't lettin' you past here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180002}I ain't lettin' you past here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,180003}This is no time for heroics. If you{F801}don't want to die, stand clear.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,0,180003}This is no time for heroics. If you{F801}don't want to die, stand clear.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180004}Don't press your luck, loser. You'll{F801}shit your pants when you see my demon.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180004}Don't press your luck, loser. You'll{F801}shit your pants when you see my demon.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180005}E-Even a fearsome National Defense{F801}Divinity couldn't stop them...!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180005}E-Even a fearsome National Defense{F801}Divinity couldn't stop them...!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180006}M... M-M... Mr. Tayamaaaaaa...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ashura-kai man\0{F87A,137}{F813,0,180006}M... M-M... Mr. Tayamaaaaaa...!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Ashura-kai man ran away...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Ashura-kai man ran away...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,180007}See how he flees... These ruffians{F801}never seem to change.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,180007}See how he flees... These ruffians{F801}never seem to change.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Ryoja's Scales started to shine in your hand...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Ryoja's Scales started to shine in your hand...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,452004}I am the Dragon Koga Saburo, one of the{F801}fierce National Defense Divinities.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,452004}I am the Dragon Koga Saburo, one of the{F801}fierce National Defense Divinities.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,452003}It matters not who you are. If you{F801}hold my medium, then you are my master.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,452010}I am honored to meet you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Koga Saburo\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,452003}It matters not who you are. If you{F801}hold my medium, then you are my master.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,452010}I am honored to meet you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 An unfriendly man is standing here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 An unfriendly man is standing here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,403213}Y-You're...! What's Koga Saburo doing!?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,403213}Y-You're...! What's Koga Saburo doing!?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,1,400203}If you're going to run, do so now.{F801}We won't stop you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,1,400203}If you're going to run, do so now.{F801}We won't stop you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,403012}Y-You don't need to tell me twice.{F801}My job ain't to fight you.{F801}{F802}I'm only supposed to escort Mr. Tayama{F801}to Yamato... What happens after that{F801}ain't my problem.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}{F813,1,403012}Y-You don't need to tell me twice.{F801}My job ain't to fight you.{F801}{F802}I'm only supposed to escort Mr. Tayama{F801}to Yamato... What happens after that{F801}ain't my problem.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}I'll let that divinity deal with ya...{F801}Go and die if ya want!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Unfriendly man\0{F87A,46}I'll let that divinity deal with ya...{F801}Go and die if ya want!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The unfriendly man quickly ran off...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The unfriendly man quickly ran off...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon turned to stone...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon turned to stone...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The stone that was once Koga Saburo{F801}sits in front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The stone that was once Koga Saburo{F801}sits in front of you...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Koga Saburo is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Koga Saburo is no longer here...{F801}
